page.title: 05CASTLEMILK
page.content: {Castlemilk}is a new housing area in{ {Glasgow}.Although it is about the size of Perth it is very poorly served by amenities like Pubs,Cinemas etc There is a tremendous amount of{ {unemployment}in Castlemilk; Children see their parents with apparantly no hope of a job _ and they know it's hardly likely they will get one either.This disenchantment leads to frustration and the frustration leads to{VANDALISM}and{VIOLENCE}. Not much thought went into the design of the houses,and the surroundings are dismal and depressing.There is broken glass,litter and boarded_up shop windows all around . While we were doing our Domesday Survey we watched 2 men lean a ladder against a wall and scrawl{graffiti}all over it. Nobody took any notice!
